title: Nitin Gadkari says don't have a problem with FM giving subsidies on Electric vehicles
description: Union Minister of Road Transport and Highways, Nitin Gadkari, stated on Monday at the 64th ACMA annual session that he has no objections to subsidies for electric vehicles (EVs) from the Finance and Heavy Industries Ministers. This comes after Gadkari previously suggested that subsidies might no longer be necessary due to falling lithium-iron battery prices and increased EV manufacturing.
